I am not quite sure why it is better to be alone than in a bad realationship people tell me it is, but I am starting to think they were telling me that because they don't like to see me suffer. why not let me suffer just a little while then after the suffering has begone, break us up. that way the singleness looks better than this suffering that I am not quite sure would have taken place in the first place. so with that out of my system I have wonderful news. I have decided that in order to preserve the way of life I have grown so fond of complaining about in my speeches and such I will now go back and find a new job. a better one. and to signify the launching of this new campaighn I will go and write the rest of my paper for class.

I wished I could run away jump in my car and drive to alexandras to see her ugly baby cat. it is so ugly it is cute. and that is scarey because at no point when you are you kissed should think to run and instead of thinking of her you would rather go see a kitten... not another girl although I wouldnt mind, but a KITTEN I am frightend and I doubt there is anything I could tell her that wouldnt brake her heart... I know that saying the flat out truth is right to do but there is no nice way of saying "hey I think we should no longer come closer than 2 feet from one another and by the way has anyone else had the urge to throw up when you kissed them? just wondered" yikes I am going to go get something cold to drink and watch old movies. looking foward to hearing from you-kyle.... scratch that....-Todd

Leave whatever you wish in a comment.

It's all interesting, even if you don't think so.

I have never though of myself as a "good" or a "bad" person. I have allways thought that I fell somewhere in the gray. Tonight I know that my indefernce has brought me down. as many of you know a few months ago my mentor, my friend, my only proof I came from my father, his brother Lezz had passed away. shortly after I broke down and hid my face from the world. I began to isolate myself and then I mett Kelly, my fall was quick, my friends left empty, and me, living an hour and a half from the house that my family loves. I was cought up in my selfish needs. when my gram fell ill and I ran, and lezz died, I forgot who my friends were. I became indiferent. I became "bad" now I truely don't believe that someone can be good or bad but I do know that when I knew what the right thing to do was and I made the choice that would keep me from being alone. I know now that I was wrong, I was not a good friend to the people who I have not spoken too in months. tonight I saw someone I have great respect for, I now want to say that I am truely sorry to all of my friends that I have been away from for so long and that I understand that some of you would rather not be my friend. I just wanted you all to know that I still love you, and that I am begining to live my life again as me.
